item.title: Weekly Review #12 - Cyberspace, Self-Definition and Boundaries
item.description: 'Here After Us - Mayday' Preface This is a record and reflection of my life from 2022-09-13 to 2022-09-18. The past week has been somewhat busy, oscillating between several projects, so I haven’t had much input. I had to work over the weekend but didn’t want to stay cooped up at home, so I went out and unexpectedly found a nice caf√© where I spent a pleasant day. Cyberspace I previously learned about the concept of “cyberspace” from Reorx’s article “Using Automated Workflows to Aggregate Information Intake and Output”.
